meanings.sent1: The hypermetrical poem was very long and had many extra lines.
meanings.sent2: Her hypermetrical speech went on for hours, much longer than anyone expected.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetrical story was so long that even the characters got tired of talking!
meanings.sent4: His hypermetrical writing style stretched the boundaries of traditional poetry.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetrical description painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive length in metrical structure.
meanings.sent1: The hypermetrical song seemed to go on forever, with endless verses.
meanings.sent2: The play's hypermetrical dialogue made the audience feel like time was standing still.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetrical movie was so long that people started bringing sleeping bags to the theater!
meanings.sent4: Her hypermetrical hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall of silk.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetrical novel was a marathon of reading, but worth every page.
